text: Mo' Money is a 1992 American criminal comedy romance movie set in Chicago. Marlon Wayans plays Seymour. Stacey Dash plays Amber. The movie is about a con-man who tries cleaning his life after meeting a girl. This movie was released in the United States on July 24, 1992. Reviews were generally negative. It premiered at #1 in the box office. == Other websites == * Category:1992 crime movies Category:1990s criminal comedy movies Category:1992 romantic comedy movies Category:American criminal comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies about con artists Category:Movies set in Chicago
title: Mo' Money
